name: Stew
description:
I kinda need you to trust me

made for Game A Week 2022 week 7, theme was pottery!

arrow keys to move!!! if u find the balcony try walking into it

potential flashing lights (a bug i didn't fix in time) also audio is pretty important in this one, might be relevant to keep in mind !

sounds:
stairs - https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/442771/

fridge - https://freesound.org/people/florianreichelt/sounds/459977/

wind - https://freesound.org/people/Notarget/sounds/434756/

step - https://freesound.org/people/yetcop/sounds/535255/

shower - https://freesound.org/people/yetcop/sounds/535255/

photos are from this pack which u can get here on itch.io: https://spacetwinks.itch.io/a-place-without-bodies
